posts.post_content:
I'm looking for a Huggins portrait to continue my [URL="http://bailencards.com/stevens-collection/t206-cincinnati/"]T206 Cincinnati team set[/URL]. I'm interested in any of the following backs:

Broad Leaf - Series 350 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
Tolstoi - Factory 30 - District 2 - State NY
Cycle - Series 350 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
American Beauty (with Frame) - Series 350- Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
Sweet Caporal - Series 350 - Factory 30 - District 2 - State NY

Low grade with no paper loss or creases preferred.

PM or email, [url]shernan30@gmail.com[/url].

Steven
